events.message: I received the wrong product in my recent order and I want to request a refund immediately because this is not what I paid for.
The customer issue has been categorized under Refund due to keywords indicating dissatisfaction and request for money back.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle the refund request and follow up with the customer.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I’m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the issue and process your refund?
Sure, my order number is 458723 and I have attached a picture of the product showing it is not what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will process your refund within 3-5 business days and you will receive a confirmation email shortly.
I appreciate the prompt response and look forward to receiving my refund soon. Thank you for your assistance.
Your refund has been successfully processed and the amount should appear in your account within a few days.
Just checking in to confirm you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since your refund has been received and you have no further questions, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support.
